Frequently Asked Questions

Do I need a credit card for the free trial?

No, you can start using the Starter plan immediately without any payment information.

Can I change plans anytime?

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from the dashboard. Changes take effect immediately.

Do you provide proxies?

We provide a proxy management tool, but you need to purchase proxies from third-party providers. We have partners with exclusive discounts.

Is the API available on all plans?

API access starts from the Professional plan. The Team plan offers higher rate limits for heavy automation.

Browser Fingerprint is an anti-detect browser designed to securely manage multiple accounts by creating isolated browser profiles with protected fingerprints, optimized for digital marketing, advertising, e-commerce, and automation.
